column1: The game ended in a tie
column2: with both teams getting a share of the points. Spain had taken the lead in the second half through Morata
column3: but Germany's Fullkrug equalised in the last 10 minutes. The result was a fair one
column4: keeping Germany in contention for the final game of the group phase. Spain are still at the top of Group E
column5: but they have yet to secure their spot in the Round of 16.
